column2:
Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |       1    |    2    |    3     |    4    |    5    |
| hobby |         |         |         |         |         |
| color  |         |         |         |         |         |
| job |         |         |         |         |         |
| movie-genre  |         |         |         |         |         |
| house  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 
There are 5 different favourite colors: red, green, ivory, yellow, blue
The people have 5 different hobbies: singing, video-games, board-games, cooking, magic-tricks
The people perfer 5 different movie-genres: satire, documentary, fantasy, mystery, horror
The people have 5 different jobs:  journalist, electrician, freelancer, lawyer, librarian
House: colonial, farmhouse, townhouse, craftsman, gothic-revival

1. the person who's hobby is singing is the person who likes red
2. the person who's hobby is video-games is the colonial house
3. the journalist is the person who likes green
4. the person who's hobby is board-games is the electrician
5. the person who likes green is to the right of the person who likes ivory
6. the person watching satire movies is the gothic-revival house
7. the person watching documentary movies is the person who likes yellow
8. the freelancer is in the middle
9. the person who's hobby is cooking is on the far left
10. the person watching fantasy movies is on the left or right of the farmhouse house
11. the person watching documentary movies is to the left or right of the craftsman house
12. the person watching mystery movies is the lawyer
13. the person who's hobby is magic-tricks is the person watching horror movies
14. the person who's hobby is cooking is to the left or right of the person who likes blue. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.
